ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] eq at work
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Well, at least you have a clear-cut response in each case! :) I don t think I have the patience to ever play a caster -- the 30th person to ask me for SoW,
ygData.messageBody:
--- Emily Bembeneck <ebembeneck@...> wrote:
> well i'm on Mithaniel Marr right now.. starting a
> char on Firiona Vie though soon.. I really wish
> everybody roleplayed more.. <sigh>
>
> Mortoner says, in Elvish, "M'Lady, I beg of you to
> grant me the spirit of wolf.. I have a long journey
> ahead of me across treacherous lands.."
>
> --or--
>
> Dikinmyazz tells you, "d00d, can i geta SOW"

Well, at least you have a clear-cut response in each
case! :)

I don't think I have the patience to ever play a
caster -- the 30th person to ask me for SoW, would
probably get nuked.

-Hanna

=====
"Bury my lovely, bury the lies, bury me under a thousand goodbyes..." - October Project
